description: Creates a Stage for an API.

parameters.name: AccessLogSettings
parameters.description: Settings for logging access in this stage. DestinationArn (string) --- The ARN of the CloudWatch Logs log group to receive access logs. Format (string) --- A single line format of the access logs of data, as specified by selected $context variables. The format must include at least $context.requestId.

nested_params.name: DestinationArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the CloudWatch Logs log group to receive access logs.

nested_params.name: Format
nested_params.description: A single line format of the access logs of data, as specified by selected $context variables. The format must include at least $context.requestId.

parameters.name: DefaultRouteSettings
parameters.description: The default route settings for the stage. DataTraceEnabled (boolean) --- Specifies whether (true) or not (false) data trace logging is enabled for this route. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Supported only for WebSocket APIs. DetailedMetricsEnabled (boolean) --- Specifies whether detailed metrics are enabled. LoggingLevel (string) --- Specifies the logging level for this route: INFO, ERROR, or OFF. ThrottlingBurstLimit (integer) --- Specifies the throttling burst limit. ThrottlingRateLimit (float) --- Specifies the throttling rate limit.

nested_params.name: DataTraceEnabled
nested_params.description: Specifies whether (true) or not (false) data trace logging is enabled for this route. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

nested_params.name: DetailedMetricsEnabled
nested_params.description: Specifies whether detailed metrics are enabled.

nested_params.name: LoggingLevel
nested_params.description: Specifies the logging level for this route: INFO, ERROR, or OFF. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

parameters.name: RouteSettings
parameters.description: Route settings for the stage, by routeKey. (string) --- (dict) --- Represents a collection of route settings. DataTraceEnabled (boolean) --- Specifies whether (true) or not (false) data trace logging is enabled for this route. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Supported only for WebSocket APIs. DetailedMetricsEnabled (boolean) --- Specifies whether detailed metrics are enabled. LoggingLevel (string) --- Specifies the logging level for this route: INFO, ERROR, or OFF. ThrottlingBurstLimit (integer) --- Specifies the throttling burst limit. ThrottlingRateLimit (float) --- Specifies the throttling rate limit.

nested_params.name: DataTraceEnabled
nested_params.description: Specifies whether (true) or not (false) data trace logging is enabled for this route. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

nested_params.name: DetailedMetricsEnabled
nested_params.description: Specifies whether detailed metrics are enabled.

nested_params.name: LoggingLevel
nested_params.description: Specifies the logging level for this route: INFO, ERROR, or OFF. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

parameters.name: StageVariables
parameters.description: A map that defines the stage variables for a Stage. Variable names can have alphanumeric and underscore characters, and the values must match [A-Za-z0-9-._~:/?#&=,]+. (string) --- (string) --- A string with a length between [0-2048].

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The collection of tags. Each tag element is associated with a given resource. (string) --- (string) --- A string with a length between [0-1600].

nested_items.name: AccessLogSettings
nested_items.description: Settings for logging access in this stage.

nested_items.name: DestinationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the CloudWatch Logs log group to receive access logs.

nested_items.name: Format
nested_items.description: A single line format of the access logs of data, as specified by selected $context variables. The format must include at least $context.requestId.

nested_items.name: ApiGatewayManaged
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a stage is managed by API Gateway. If you created an API using quick create, the $default stage is managed by API Gateway. You can't modify the $default stage.

nested_items.name: AutoDeploy
nested_items.description: Specifies whether updates to an API automatically trigger a new deployment. The default value is false.

nested_items.name: ClientCertificateId
nested_items.description: The identifier of a client certificate for a Stage. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the stage was created.

nested_items.name: DefaultRouteSettings
nested_items.description: Default route settings for the stage.

nested_items.name: DataTraceEnabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether (true) or not (false) data trace logging is enabled for this route. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

nested_items.name: DetailedMetricsEnabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether detailed metrics are enabled.

nested_items.name: LoggingLevel
nested_items.description: Specifies the logging level for this route: INFO, ERROR, or OFF. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Supported only for WebSocket APIs.

nested_items.name: ThrottlingBurstLimit
nested_items.description: Specifies the throttling burst limit.

nested_items.name: ThrottlingRateLimit
nested_items.description: Specifies the throttling rate limit.

nested_items.name: DeploymentId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Deployment that the Stage is associated with. Can't be updated if autoDeploy is enabled.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the stage.

nested_items.name: LastDeploymentStatusMessage
nested_items.description: Describes the status of the last deployment of a stage. Supported only for stages with autoDeploy enabled.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the stage was last updated.

nested_items.name: RouteSettings
nested_items.description: Route settings for the stage, by routeKey.
